text: TM Eye Ltd is a private investigations company based in Epping specialising in intellectual property crime. It was established by David McKelvey, a former Metropolitan Police Service Detective Chief Inspector in 2010. DCI McKelvey appeared in a Panorama programme in 2016, Cops, Criminals, Corruption - An Inside Story. It worked with Japan Tobacco International to prosecute an illegal tobacco seller who was convicted on the firm's evidence at Highbury Corner Magistrates’ Court. It was involved with the investigation of fake prescription drugs sold online that led to prosecutions in India. It runs a private police service called My Local Bobby. == Notes and references== Category:Security companies of the United Kingdom Category:Companies based in Essex Category:Private detectives and investigators
title: TM Eye Ltd
